Html:
Great application.

Im new to silverlight. the prblem im facing is that i have creata the new xml in app_data folder, now i want to retrieve from it. its a exact copy of the xml whose link is provided in the source code.

this is what i hve done. in

 

 WebClient webClient = new WebClient();

 context.Cache.Insert("movieXml", xml, null, DateTime.UtcNow.AddDays(1), TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0));

changed xml path to this path.

but im getting this exception "Data at the root level is invalid. Line 1, position 1."
